Title: Relates to transferring any unspent funds from the regents health care professional opportunity scholarship program to the regents physician loan forgiveness program
Summary: Transfers any unspent funds from the regents health care professional opportunity scholarship program to the regents physician loan forgiveness program; provides direction to distribute these funds to meet the same purposes as originally intended.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to funding of physician loan forgiveness programs
